ygData.subject: Bushido Base - Enter the minions

Subject: Bushido Base - Enter the minions
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=180614363; y=veE7EM6GzE9LFWJEthn22gU4VGXa_b5JjHu7rZSvzZaOZ9M1oZrfbA

At the outskirts of the Valley Mine several unknown figures stand
hidden amidst stones and rocks, far down the dried up river bed. One of
them is looking towards the distant city as they speak amongst
themselves. 

"All of you know what to do. I don't have to reiterate it here." the
tallest of the figures spoke, his form strong and resolute. "Find out
what you can about the target, relay it to the others and prepare to
acquire it on my command."

"What about the cybers in there?" says a strong female voice, who's 
whisper still had to be stiffled. "Won't they object to us?"

"Unlikely."  a deep blue armored figure spoke up, his military bearing
obvious both in his voice and stance as he crouched in the shadows
looking at the distant city in view-finders, "We have no rank or
insignia, and our identities are largely unknown. Infiltration should
not be difficult."

"*If* our intell is even correct." Spoke up another female voice. She
shifted position and for a moment the shadows parted to reveal a
portion  her crimson armor before the darkness enfolded her again. "It
is old now."

"That it what we are here to find out." says the first voice, gruff and
commanding, quite obviously their leader. "Get in, find out what we can
find and get out. Nothing more and nothing less." He turned to look at
the others. "Any questions?"

Silence answered his question.

"Good." He activated his com panel and opened an encrypted channel,
"How is the terrain, is everything in readiness?"

------------------

From his position much nearer to the quarry a dark figure looked from
the shadows, his shielding protecting him from the prying optic as well
as the errant sensor. "Prepare yourselves." his whisper silent voice
emanated over the channels. He paused and looked around one last time,
passive scanners seeking anything out of the ordinary ....


OOC: Is there anything we should know about the Bushido base before
entering???

Preston
(Da'minion)
